short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The HiringCenter Extension helps recruiters engage candidates anywhere on the web, including from their CRM, Indeed, and LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HiringCenter is a candidate engagement platform that uses text message, phone, email, and artificial intelligence to help you recruiting real estate agents faster.  The platform centralizes all your communications, allowing recruiters manage relationships with their talent throughout the entire recruiting process.  By adding the HiringCenter extension to your Chrome browser, you will automatically detect mobile numbers, create candidates in HiringCenter, and send and receive messages from any website. Search candidates by name, filter by stages and tags, scheduled messages, and much more.  All candidates, conversations, and data will continue to be tracked in your TextRecruit account.
